tag_list: id-incu, idincu, survey, mobile-survey, mobile, entrepreneur, korea, startup, index, fund, index-fund
overview:
Currently takes a role of CEO at IDINCU (Seoul, Korea) developing OPENSURVEY - the research platform empowering clients to be insightful through effective gathering of customer opinion using mobile application. He is one of twenty ESOMAR (European Society for Opinion and Marketing Research) members in Korea.

Experiences - As a product manager at Gretech (Seoul, Korea), he was responsible for new product development of leading media player (GOM Player, 900 million accumulated download worldwide) He was formerly a financial engineer at WISEfn (Seoul, Korea) developing index fund for leading mutual funds; one of his work, Samsung Group Value Index Fund , raised half billion dollar in six months. He also managed purchasing processes at HG Trade (Santa Clara, California).

Education - Selected as an honored student at Yonsei University. Completed Entrepreneurship Incubator Program at UCLA and GERI Program at Purdue University. He also experienced an exchange student program at San Jose State University.

Achievements - He won gold place award at Microsoft Imagine Cup, Samsung Electronics Thesis Prize, and SK Telecom New Business Plan Competition. Plus, he was a representative of Korea at Microsoft Imangine Cup World Final, Intel International Science and Engineering Fair, and International Young Physicist Tournament. He also was a finalist of Silicon Valley Business Plan Competition and Monitor Group Case Competition.

Leadership - Founded an international professionals’ network (Link Your Passion). He also served management roles of prestigious clubs including NAEK Young Engineers Honor Society, Yonsei Management Consulting Group, Platon Academy Network, and Learning and Analyzing FUTure Association

milestones.description: Raised a half billion dollar for Samsung Group Value Index Fund
milestones.source_description: Samsung Group Value Index Fund raised $432 million
